body_html: How did you install NCCL? NCCL is a library provided by Nvidia. You can download it and read more about it here https://developer.nvidia.com/nccl . There are different NCCL libraries for different CUDA versions. You have CUDA 9 but it looks like your NCCL was built for CUDA 8, so you will have to reinstall the correct NCCL version. Please reopen this issue if reinstalling the correct NCCL doesn't fix it for you.

body: How did you install NCCL? NCCL is a library provided by Nvidia. You can download it and read more about it here https://developer.nvidia.com/nccl . There are different NCCL libraries for different CUDA versions. You have CUDA 9 but it looks like your NCCL was built for CUDA 8, so you will have to reinstall the correct NCCL version. Please reopen this issue if reinstalling the correct NCCL doesn't fix it for you.
